transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ya hello.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ya hi mam Indiamart se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Okay kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Hello. Ah Sanshika baat kar rahi hu mam. Sanshika Sanshika baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Yes mam kaha the mam kitne call kar liye subah se.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Aapko kitni bari call kar liya aaj morning se.
Executive: Abhi aapka do bar call aaya mam ye wale number se aur lunch time chal raha tha is vajah se maine connect nahi mai connect nahi kar paya aur mai already ek meeting me thi mam.
Customer: Okay. Haan bataiye. Wahi mam us din baat hui thi aapse to wo abhi tak solve nahi hua issue same problem chal rahi hai. Even abhi phone pe bhi calls nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Lead hi nahi aa rahi hai agar koi aa bhi rahi hai to wo jaise hi usko open karte hai wo already expired hoti hai.
Executive: Wo aapka sort out nahi hua?
Customer: Nahi abhi tak nahi hua even system pe bhi abhi yahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Okay mam. Ah. System pe bhi leads nahi aa rahi hai aapko.
Executive: Okay ek minute mam hold kijiye. Call pe hi hold kijiye.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Hello. Mam bol rahi thi aaj ke din me bhi ye jo aapne bola aaj ke din me bhi sare leads sold out hi ho gaye jo bhi lead dikh rahe the.
Customer: Yes mam yes mam. Actually leads aaj aayi nahi hai sahi batau to mai past lead me hi check kar rahi thi.
Executive: Past lead me to mam wo alag cheez hai na past lead me. Mere pass leads nahi aayi aayi thi to mai check kar rahi thi past lead me ki kitni leads matlab sold ho chuki hai jo mere pass show hi nahi kar rahi hai.
Customer: Mam wo ho sakta hai aapne portal on karke nahi dekha hoga but wo acha ye sara cheez ka na mam bol rahi hu jitna bhi aapke pass jo aa raha hai theek hai aapke pass jo bhi leads aa raha hai na proper jo sold out dikha raha hai na wo sara ka mujhe ek screenshot se kuch nahi hoga aap wo sara jaise ek do din ke andar me jo bhi hoga na wo aap ek bar mujhe sara screenshot share kar dijiye. Kyunki mai isko aage click kar bhi du mam kar chuki hu already aapko team se bhi call gaya hai but wo cheez wahi hai jo out of stock ho ja raha hai kyunki connect kar le rahe insan isko just is vajah se.
Customer: Ye reason aa raha hai out of stock hone ka aur koi reason nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Kya reason hai?
Customer: Matlab jaise wo bhi jo bhi lead available hota hai na aur bhi log jo hai jo teen char hamare pass jo eligible hote hai connect karne ke liye wo log turant connect kar le rahe hai iski vajah se sold out ho ja raha hai kyunki ek lead ki to capacity hi hoti hai na char se panch log teen log aise hi connect kar sakte hai.
Customer: Wo baat to theek hai mam but mam show to hone chahiye na jab leads hi nahi aayengi to wo usko consume kaise karenge?
Executive: Sold out leads mam show nahi hoti hai agar aap portal hamesha to khol ke nahi dekh rahe honge may be ho sakta hai aap. Mam portal sara din hi open rehta hai.
Executive: Aap wo sara mujhe na ek do din ka screenshot bhej do mam at least mai ek bar aur mai apne senior se bhi connect karwa de rahi hu aapko ek bar aap mujhe sara screenshot share kar do.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads on the portal.

- Buyleads are shown as sold out immediately.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share screenshots of the issue.

- Executive will connect customer with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share screenshots.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sold out, portal, screenshots
